meanings.definition: Not the same as something else.
meanings.sent1: The two flowers were different colors.
meanings.sent2: She wore a different dress to the party.
meanings.sent3: It was funny how their different hairstyles matched perfectly.
meanings.sent4: His approach to problem-solving was as different as night and day.
meanings.sent5: The taste of each fruit was different, making the experience exciting.

meanings.definition: Distinct or separate from something else.
meanings.sent1: The two houses had different designs.
meanings.sent3: The different paths they took led to the same destination.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was different, like a melody in a quiet room.
meanings.sent5: The different scents in the garden created a unique atmosphere.

meanings.definition: Differing in some way from something else.
meanings.sent1: Their opinions on the matter were different.
meanings.sent2: The weather today is different from yesterday.
meanings.sent3: The different flavors in the dish danced on her taste buds.
meanings.sent4: His perspective on life was different, like looking through a kaleidoscope.
meanings.sent5: The different textures of the fabric made it interesting to touch.
